definition: Goals refer to strategic objectives that you are pursuing with your communications efforts. Goals can be stored in the respective strategy area when creating ideas, content, topics & assets.

A hashtag enables tagging by marking a word or a string of words with a hash (#). Hashtags are used in content creation and are thus used for external tagging on the corresponding channels. Topic-related hashtags can be grouped into hashtag groups and thus selected with one click during content creation.
Ideas are a preliminary stage to final content. Unlike content, ideas do not yet have a publication date and do not appear in the calendar. An idea can become a content or a topic.
The event module contains all events that are relevant for your editorial planning. Events or occasions are often happenings. Content can be created for an event.

The ability to make changes to objects in table views without having to open them in the detail view. Note: The inline editing option is indicated by a pencil that appears when hovering over the fields.
This module contains all external content to which you have subscribed to RSS feeds in advance. An inspiration can be turned into an idea or content with one click.
